animeDescription: A DVD-only episode bundled with the special edition Take Moon volume.   Caren Ortensia attempts to control the world using money with varying degrees of success, Phantas-Moon receives a movie adaption of her T.V. show, and Shiki is involved in a love plot that spans years.     (Source: Wikipedia)
